code: var getCurrentTime=function getCurrentTime(){var date=new Date();var hour=date.getHours();return hour>5&&hour<17?"light":"dark";};var handleTheme=function handleTheme(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:getCurrentTime();var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"SET_LIGHT":return action.payload;case"SET_DARK":return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default handleTheme;
